data.title: Panzer General: Allied Assault Achievements
data.meta_description: Here is the full list of all 12 Panzer General: Allied Assault achievements worth 200 gamerscore.
data.text:
Battle of the Bulge Ribbon

Successfully complete the entire Campaign.

Training Ribbon

Win your first Multiplayer game on Xbox LIVE.

Bronze Star

Win a total of 15 Multiplayer games on Xbox LIVE.

Fifty Mission Crush

Win a total of 50 Multiplayer games on Xbox LIVE.

2 guides

Silver Star

Destroy a unit with 6 or more health in one combat.

Air Commander

Play 6 or more "Air" cards in one game.

2 guides

Artillery Commander

Use 4 or more artillery units in support of a single combat in one game.
